divs: Sighting Detailsi was out side looking at stars and planets thru my telescope. i had weirdtingling sensasiton i looked up and saw a large floating object just above thetree tops , i thought it was a helocopter the i noticed there was not anynoise.. i wasnt scared at all it just kinda took my breath at first i was inamazement. it was moving very very slowly towards the small sown and therewas like a beam comming out of it like a search light a real bright bluelight it move over town i watched it till it went over the other side of amountain...
